Uses of Package
org.cast.cwm.glossary

Packages that use org.cast.cwm.glossary
org.cast.cwm.glossary   
 

Classes in org.cast.cwm.glossary used by org.cast.cwm.glossary
Glossary
          This class encapsulates the notion of a Glossary.
Glossary.LengthComparator
          Comparator for alternate forms of glossary words.
GlossaryService
          A service class for storing Glossary words in a data store.
GlossaryTransformer
          Takes an XML node and replaces in-text glossary words with 'glossary' nodes.
GlossaryTransformer.WordLocation
          Stores beginning and ending character positions of a glossary word within a text block.
IGlossaryEntry
          An interface for a glossary entry representing a single glossary word.
IWritableGlossaryEntry
          An interface for a glossary entry representing a single glossary word.
